title: Shut Up And Talk: An Effective Guide to Communication Skills
description: Shut Up and Talk by international fitness guru and choreographer Bill Calhoun is here to help. Drawing on a wide range of timeless principles, Shut Up and Talk offers modern men and women a sourcebook of practical advice on becoming skilled communicators. The book begins with a set of time-honored communication basics and expands into dozens of short, easy-to-apply lessons in business, social, and public communication topics.
author: Bill Calhoun
